snippet: The Standard Chartered banker, Wu Yidian Eden, a Singaporean citizen, has been held since March 6 following questioning about one of her private banking clients, her fiancé said.
abstract: Standard Chartered banker Wu Yidian Eden, a Singapore citizen, is being held by police in China on suspicion that she aided a wealthy client who was accused of having fled the country with millions of dollars in state assets.
lead_paragraph: The Standard Chartered banker, Wu Yidian Eden, a Singaporean citizen, has been held since March 6 following questioning about one of her private banking clients, her fiancé said.

headline.main: Banker of Standard Chartered Held in Investigation
headline.print_headline: Banker of Standard Chartered Held in Investigation
